    CollisionDetector - Class in us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics
    The CollisionDetector class is responsible for detecting collisions between celestial bodies in the physics simulation.
    CollisionDetector() - Constructor for class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.CollisionDetector
     
    CollisionEvent - Class in us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics
    The CollisionEvent class represents a collision between two celestial bodies in the simulation.
    CollisionEvent(Body, Body, double) - Constructor for class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.CollisionEvent
    Creates a new collision event between two bodies at a specific time.
    color(Color) - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.BodyBuilder
    Sets the color for rendering the body.
    compareTo(CollisionEvent) - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.CollisionEvent
    Compares this collision event with another based on their occurrence times.
    convertPoint(Vector3D, Vector3D) - Static method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.graphics.Graphics3D
    Transforms a point in 3D space to be displayed in 2D space.
    copy() - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Vector3D
    Create a new Vector3D with identical values.
    copyFrom(Vector3D) - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Vector3D
    Sets all components of this vector to match those of another vector.
    createDefaultInnerPlanet() - Static method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.BodyFactory
    Creates a default inner planet with Mercury-like properties.
    createDefaultOuterPlanet() - Static method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.BodyFactory

    createDefaultStar() - Static method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.BodyFactory
